Description:
We are currently seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Financial Collector to join our team in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. As a Financial Collector, you will be responsible for managing and collecting outstanding debts from our clients. This role requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience in financial collections and a strong understanding of debt recovery processes.Responsibilities:Contact clients to discuss outstanding debts and negotiate payment plans
Monitor and follow up on overdue accounts
Research and investigate delinquent accounts to determine reasons for non-payment
Prepare and send collection letters and notices to debtors
Document all communication and actions taken in the collection system
Work closely with the finance and legal departments to resolve any escalated issues
Provide regular updates on collection activities to management
Develop and implement strategies for improving collection efficiency
Stay up-to-date on industry regulations and best practices in debt recoverySkills

Minimum of 5 years of experience in financial collections or related field
Strong negotiation and communication skills
Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving abilities
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Proficient in using collection software and Microsoft Office Suite

Ability to handle high-pressure situations and difficult clients
Strong organizational and time management skills
Fluency in Arabic and English is required
